title: Golden crumble flapjacks
ingredients: ['200g unsalted butter', '5 tablespoons golden syrup', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '150g porridge oats', '2 tablespoons plain white flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder']
